Padesa Sutta：1．Padesa SuttaA conversation between Sāriputta，Anuruddha and Moggallāna in the Ketakivana in Sāketa，regarding the meaning of the word ”sekha．” A sekha is one who has only partially cultivated the four satipatthānas．S．v．174f．

2．Padesa SuttaWhoever cultivates psychic power，partially，can only do so by cultivating and developing the four bases of psychic power （iddhi-pādā）．S．v．255．
